    Reference

    All functions

    cell_count()

    Count filled cells

    centroid()

    Centroid

    convexity()

    Calculate convexity

    crop_dem()

    Crop DEM around Points

    csf()

    Colony Shape Factor

    dem_to_mesh()

    DEM to 3D mesh

    dem_to_points()

    Transform DEM to 3D pointcloud of raster corners.

    detect_drop()

    Detect a sudden drop, edge, or overhang in a DEM

    extent()

    Calculate extent of a 3D object

    fd()

    Fractal dimension

    fd_area()

    Calculate fractal dimension using the surface area method

    fd_cubes()

    Calculate fractal dimension using cube counting

    fd_hvar()

    Calculate fractal Dimension using the height variation method

    horseshoe

    Horseshoe reef

    hr()

    Height range

    hvar()

    Height Variation in cells at different scales

    mcap

    Montipora capitata

    mesh_to_dem()

    3D Mesh to DEM

    mesh_to_points()

    Transform DEM to 3D pointcloud of raster corners

    mid_find()

    Find midpoint of a DEM

    packing()

    Calculate packing

    planar()

    Calculates planar area of a mesh

    rdh()

    Calculate rugosity, fractal dimension and height for a DEM

    rdh_theory()

    Geometric plane equation

    rescale()

    Rescale

    rg()

    Rugosity

    sa_triangle()

    Surface area of triangle

    sample_dem()

    Sample a random DEM with specified size from a larger DEM

    scale_area()

    Re-scale mesh based on a fixed area

    scale_volume()

    Re-scale mesh based on a fixed volume of 1

    set_origin()

    Set the origin of a mesh

    sim_xyz()

    Simulate z values

    sma()

    Second moment area

    smv()

    Second moment volume

    sphericity()

    Calculate sphericity

    split_dem()

    Split DEM into smaller tiles

    surface_area()

    Surface area

    svol_triangle()

    Signed volume of triangle
